Source Summit Scitech - London

By Lino Velev

October 20, 2017

From 10:00 to 18:00


Buy Tickets

Scitech in high-growth South American markets

This Source Summit is run with The Royal Academy Of Engineering’s Leaders in Innovation Fellowships (LIF) programme.

You’ll learn from and support 50 engineers from selected from respected academic institutions in Colombia, Brazil and Chile. Each has developed defensible technology in healthcare, agriculture, manufacturing and a range of other hard sciences.

Schedule

9:00 - Registration

10:00 - Opening and session planning

11:00 - 45-minute sessions

12:30 - Lunch

13:00 - Additional session planning

13:30 - Sessions continue

16:30 - Joint closing session

17:00 - Drinks and snacks

Venue

Tobacco Dock

Spaces and a community for the #IdeasGeneration. A place where people congregate and ideas are exchanged.
